body_html:
It's pretty clearly a protobuf issue. The question is why. Allegedly it's only in the C++ backend. Another thing that could be tried. Either way, a workaround is to avoid Protobuf.

body:
It's pretty clearly a protobuf issue. The question is why. Allegedly it's
only in the C++ backend. Another thing that could be tried.

Either way, a workaround is to avoid Protobuf.

On Sep 8, 2017 19:32, "loki der quaeler" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Just to be replete, i have verified that (1.) occurs in the Python
> releases of TF 1.3.0 and 1.2.0
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
